item.title: Large puddle, 26th October
item.description:

item.title: Gate at back of play area is broken, 26th October
item.description:
The gate at the back of the Riverside Gardens play area is broken. It looks like the hydraulic mechanism has come loose. Now the gate swings freely and the piece is sticking out at an awkward angle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): William Cory Promenade, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
